description.plain:
Liza Anne (born Elizabeth Anne Odachowski) is an American folk musician from Saint Simons Island, Georgia.

She started writing journal entries, poetry and emotional rants at age 8 and turning them into songs at around 13 years old when she learned how to play guitar. She took piano and guitar lessons as a child and hated them both, but her uncle encouraged her to continue playing.

Liza Anne began her career in 2010. In 2014 she released her debut full-length album titled The Colder Months.

She released her second full-length album Two in May 2015.

Her third studio album Fine but Dying was released on March 9, 2018.
